titleStmt.title: Gods parley vvith princes with an appeale from them to him. The summe of two sermons on the 3. last verses of the 82. Psalme; preached at Sergeants-Inne in Fleet-Streete. By Thomas Gataker B. of D. and pastor of Rotherhith.
titleStmt.author: Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw: Griffin, and are to be sold by Timothy Barlow, at his shop in Pauls-Church-yard at the signe of the Bull-head,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Also issued as part 3 of: Certaine sermons first preached and since published.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls-Church-yard at the signe of the Bull-head
